omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		NHSNumber,
		Postcode
from omop_staging.oxford_gp_demographic
where Postcode is not null
order by
	NHSNumber,
	Postcode

omopColumns.name: zip
omopColumns.operation_description: Uppercase the postcode then insert the space in the correct location, if needed.
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		NHSNumber,
		Postcode
from omop_staging.oxford_gp_demographic
where Postcode is not null
order by
	NHSNumber,
	Postcode

omopColumns.name: location_source_value
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		NHSNumber,
		Postcode
from omop_staging.oxford_gp_demographic
where Postcode is not null
order by
	NHSNumber,
	Postcode
